summary: Request to expose the workflow start time through workflowInfo().startTime in the TypeScript SDK. This follows the API exposed in sdk-core PR #416.
userImpact: Enables users to access workflow start time during execution for timing-related logic and analytics.
proposedFix: Expose startTime field in workflowInfo() API, consistent with sdk-core implementation
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented and exposed in the SDK, following the sdk-core PR #416 specification
